template<class T>
Array2DReference< T >::Array2DReference ( Array< T > &  v  )  [inline, inherited]

Assigns the values of array "v" to the current array 2D reference.

The sizes of the current array reference, including the pointer matrix ptrArrM are adopted to the size of array v

Parameters:
v array with the new values for the current array reference
Returns:
the current array reference with the new values

template<class T>
ArrayTable<T>& ArrayTable< T >::operator= ( const T &  d  )  [inline, inherited]

Assigns one value to all elements of an ArrayTable.

This method assigns one given value d to all elements of an array.

Parameters:
d Value which should be assigned.
Returns:
A reference to the current ArrayTable object (after assignment).
Author:
M. Toussaint
Date:
2000
Changes
ra, 2001-12-12: Changed type of parameter d from "double" to "const T&".

template<class T>
ArrayTable<T>& ArrayTable< T >::operator= ( const ArrayTable< T > &  a  )  [inline, inherited]

Assigns the values of one ArrayTable to another.

This method assigns the values of one array to another. After this operation both arrays have the same content as well as the same size and dimensionality.

Parameters:
a ArrayTable object that is assigned to the current ArrayTable object.
Returns:
A reference to the current ArrayTable object (after assignment).
Author:
M. Toussaint
Date:
2000
Changes
none
Status
none

template<class T>
Array2DReference< T > Array2DReference< T >::operator= ( const Array2D< T > &  v  )  [inline, inherited]

Assigns the values of the 2-dimensional array "v" to the current array 2D reference.

The size of the current array 2D reference is adopted to the size of the 2-dimensional array v.

Parameters:
v 2-dimensional array with the new values for the current array reference
Returns:
the current array 2D reference with the new values
Exceptions:
check_exception the type of the exception is "size mismatch" and indicates that the current array is a static array reference whose size is different to that of v
Author:
M. Kreutz
Date:
2001-04-24
Changes
none
Status
stable

template<class T>
Array2DReference< T > Array2DReference< T >::operator= ( const Array< T > &  v  )  [inline, inherited]

Assigns the values of array "v" to the current array 2D reference.

The size of the current array reference is adopted to the size of array v.

Parameters:
v array with the new values for the current array reference
Returns:
the current array 2D reference with the new values
Exceptions:
check_exception the type of the exception is "size mismatch" and indicates that v is not a 2-dimensional or non-dimensional array or that the current array is a static array reference whose size is different to that of v

template<class T>
Array< T >& Array< T >::operator= ( const std::vector< T > &  v  )  [inline, inherited]

Assigns the values of vector "v" to the current array.

The size of the array is adopted to the size of the vector v.

Parameters:
v vector with the new values for the array
Returns:
the array with the new values
Exceptions:
check_exception if the type of the exception will be "size mismatch", then the current array is a static array reference and has not the same size then the array v
